title: Building Secure Authentication with OpenID Connect in Spring Boot
description: A comprehensive guide on implementing OIDC authentication in Apache DolphinScheduler for enterprise-grade security with Keycloak, Okta, and Azure AD integration.
author: Aryan Kumar

title: Google Summer of Code 2025 Experience: Contributing to Apache DolphinScheduler
description: Insights and learnings from being selected in the top 5% of 23,000+ GSoC applicants and my journey contributing to Apache open-source projects.
author: Aryan Kumar

title: Microservices Architecture Best Practices in Modern Web Development
description: Practical guide to designing scalable microservices using Spring Boot, Docker, and Kubernetes with real-world examples.
author: Aryan Kumar

title: Optimizing React Performance for High-Scale Applications
description: Deep dive into React 19 features, useMemo, and virtualization techniques to handle large datasets effectively.
author: Aryan Kumar

title: Understanding Distributed Systems Patterns
description: Explaining core patterns like Circuit Breaker, Saga, and CQRS with simple analogies and code snippets.
author: Aryan Kumar
